title: Womens Dress
title_original: REEMONDE Womens Rhinestones Open Front Poncho Shawl Wrap Cape Ruana Travel Blanket Cardigan

specs.Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here
specs.Best Sellers Rank: #93,906 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ( See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ) #707 in Women's Cardigans

category: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry > Women > Clothing > Sweaters > Cardigans

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the poncho shawl to be sparkly and well-made, with one noting that the crystals/rhinestones are not over-stated.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceeded my expectations
items.body: The quality exceeded what I was expecting. It is a heavier material than I thought it would be, and so very pleased with it. I washed it on declicate cycle and dried until just damp on extra low. Still looks brand new. Read more
items.author: K

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s amazing for travel!
items.body: The media could not be loaded. I love it! Very warm for traveling, cozy, big but not takes a lot of space in the baggage. Smooth for skin and looks elegant in airport. Good quality and I love that I found it! Read more
items.author: Alex Mikhailidi

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Versatile wrap
items.body: Beautiful. Dressy. A great wrap to dress up or be casual. Comfy but not too heavy. Read more
items.author: Ruth P.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful but short
items.body: Beautiful color and quality but very short. I'm 5'8. Read more
items.author: wendy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Reversible
items.body: It is truly reversible with the stone shimmer stones on one side and a solid Dark Navy Blue on the other. Large enough for a plus size wearer. Shawl has some weight to it so it should be good for cooler evening wear. Very happy with this purchase. Read more
items.author: Just-in-time

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful
items.body: Can't wait to wear this for Christmas events. It's beautiful, good quality, versatile. Read more
items.author: Amber Eden

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Travel
items.body: I love this cape! It’s so soft and keeps me warm on flights. No matter what I’m wearing underneath, it covers everything and still makes me look good. It’s also small enough to fit in my carry-on bag. Definitely a great travel item — I highly recommend it! Read more
items.author: Valka

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Shoddy craftsmanship
items.body: Very shoddy. Each side is a different length and do not match. This item is a joke and they charged me $49 for it! Returned it. Also bought the beige and while both sides match it is very heavy compared to the black one which is very thin. Once again, very shoddy workmanship not worth $49 or 39 which they're charging now. If they took the price down to $15 I might try it again Read more
items.author: Teri Feaser

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Khaki, Pale Pink, Burgundy, Royal Blue, Dark Blue, Light Gray, Black, Camel, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
